name: Streaming beam Python flex template
description: Streaming beam example for python flex template.

parameters.name: input_subscription
parameters.label: Input PubSub Subscription
parameters.helpText: Fully qualified name of the input Pubsub subscription that reads changes to a bucket. i.e. projects/*/subscriptions/*. Each message should be the full filename of the GCS object to run the pipeline against.

parameters.name: output_topic
parameters.label: Output PubSub topic
parameters.helpText: Fully qualified name of the output Pubsub topic. i.e. projects/*/topics/*. Messgaes will be JSON of the form {"filename": string, "ssn_counts": int }

parameters.name: secret_name
parameters.label: Hash key secret
parameters.helpText: Fully qualified name of the Secret Maneger secret where the base64 encoded hash key is stored. i.e. projects/*/secrets/*

parameters.name: firestore_project
parameters.label: Firestore Project Id
parameters.helpText: Project Id where Firestore database is located and where DLP will be executed.

parameters.name: collection_name
parameters.label: Collection Name
parameters.helpText: Name of the Firestore collection where hashed SSNs are stored
